title: Is We Dumb? | Square Root. Rhino. Morning Wood. Where's the baby?
description:
Have you ever gone into the grocery store and realized how insane toilet paper math is?! Why are we just letting these companies create their own meaning and values for numbers? Let's talk about that, Rhino Lining your colon, Dan scaring people with his latest tattoo, getting stuck in a wall completely naked for 3 days, and more on today's episode of Is We Dumb?!

 

Bad Magic Xmas Gathering: https://www.scener.com/achristmasstory

 

New episodes every Wednesday at 12pm PST

 

Watch this episode on YouTube:  https://youtu.be/CXQYFaaDNp0

 

Suggestions for segment content: dumb@iswedumb.com

Anything else: info@iswedumb.com
